description.en: You MUST use this before any creative work - creating features, building components, adding functionality, or modifying behavior. Explores user intent, requirements and design before implementation.
description.zh: 在任何创意工作之前必须使用 - 创建功能、构建组件、添加功能或修改行为。在实施之前探索用户意图、需求和设计。

description.en: Build scalable design systems with design tokens, theming infrastructure, and component architecture patterns. Use when creating design tokens, implementing theme switching, building component libraries, or establishing design system foundations.
description.zh: 使用设计令牌、主题基础设施和组件架构模式构建可扩展的设计系统。用于创建设计令牌、实现主题切换、构建组件库或建立设计系统基础。

description.en: Comprehensive Go code review skill for PR reviews, architecture assessment, and test quality analysis. Use when reviewing Go code to ensure adherence to Go best practices, security standards, and project-specific patterns.
description.zh: 用于 PR 审查、架构评估和测试质量分析的全面 Go 代码审查技能。审查 Go 代码时使用，以确保符合 Go 最佳实践、安全标准和项目特定模式。

description.en: Idiomatic Go patterns, best practices, and conventions for building robust, efficient, and maintainable Go applications.
description.zh: 用于构建健壮、高效和可维护 Go 应用程序的惯用 Go 模式、最佳实践和约定。

description.en: Go testing patterns including table-driven tests, subtests, benchmarks, fuzzing, and test coverage. Follows TDD methodology with idiomatic Go practices.
description.zh: 包括表驱动测试、子测试、基准测试、模糊测试和测试覆盖率的 Go 测试模式。遵循 TDD 方法和惯用的 Go 实践。

name.zh: 修复代码、检查错误、格式化

description.en: Use when you have lint errors, formatting issues, or before committing code to ensure it passes CI.
description.zh: 当您有代码检查错误、格式化问题或在提交代码之前使用，以确保它通过 CI。

description.en: Master React Native styling, navigation, and Reanimated animations for cross-platform mobile development. Use when building React Native apps, implementing navigation patterns, or creating performant animations.
description.zh: 掌握 React Native 样式、导航和 Reanimated 动画，用于跨平台移动开发。构建 React Native 应用、实现导航模式或创建高性能动画时使用。

description.en: Use this skill when adding authentication, handling user input, working with secrets, creating API endpoints, or implementing payment/sensitive features. Provides comprehensive security checklist and patterns.
description.zh: 在添加身份验证、处理用户输入、使用密钥、创建 API 端点或实现支付/敏感功能时使用此技能。提供全面的安全检查清单和模式。

description.en: Master React, Vue, and Svelte component patterns including CSS-in-JS, composition strategies, and reusable component architecture. Use when building UI component libraries, designing component APIs, or implementing frontend design systems.
description.zh: 掌握 React、Vue 和 Svelte 组件模式，包括 CSS-in-JS、组合策略和可重用的组件架构。构建 UI 组件库、设计组件 API 或实现前端设计系统时使用。

description.en: Guide for creating effective skills. This skill should be used when users want to create a new skill (or update an existing skill) that extends Claude's capabilities with specialized knowledge, workflows, or tool integrations.
description.zh: 创建有效技能的指南。当用户想要创建一个新技能（或更新现有技能）以通过专业知识、工作流程或工具集成来扩展 Claude 的功能时，应使用此技能。

description.en: Apply typography, color theory, spacing systems, and iconography principles to create cohesive visual designs. Use when establishing design tokens, building style guides, or improving visual hierarchy and consistency.
description.zh: 应用排版、色彩理论、间距系统和图标设计原则来创建协调的视觉设计。建立设计令牌、构建样式指南或改善视觉层次和一致性时使用。

name.zh: 创建 Web 前端项目

description.en: Frontend project creator supporting React with MUI/shadcn/ui/Bootstrap, includes routing and multi-page structure, generates TypeScript + Vite projects instantly.
description.zh: 前端项目创建器，支持 React + MUI/shadcn/ui/Bootstrap，内置路由和多页面结构，一键生成 TypeScript + Vite 项目。

name.zh: UI/UX 专业版 - 设计智能

description.en: Searchable database of UI styles, color palettes, font pairings, chart types, product recommendations, UX guidelines, and stack-specific best practices. Supports React, Next.js, Vue, Svelte, SwiftUI, React Native, Flutter, Tailwind, and shadcn/ui. Use when building frontend pages, landing pages, dashboards, admin panels, e-commerce sites, SaaS apps, portfolios, blogs, or mobile apps.
description.zh: 可搜索的 UI 风格、调色板、字体配对、图表类型、产品推荐、UX 指南和特定技术栈最佳实践数据库。支持 React、Next.js、Vue、Svelte、SwiftUI、React Native、Flutter、Tailwind 和 shadcn/ui。用于构建前端页面、落地页、仪表板、管理面板、电商网站、SaaS 应用、作品集、博客或移动应用时使用。

description.en: Guide users through feature specification development using EARS patterns and INCOSE quality rules. Creates requirements documents and technical design specifications with iterative user feedback.
description.zh: 使用 EARS 模式和 INCOSE 质量规则引导用户完成功能规格说明开发。通过迭代用户反馈创建需求文档和技术设计规范。

description.en: Recursively analyze project structure and code to generate DeepWiki-style complete project documentation. Supports three modes: new project planning, full generation, and sync/refresh.
description.zh: 递归分析项目结构和代码内容，生成 DeepWiki 风格的完整项目文档。支持三种模式：新项目规划、完整生成、同步/刷新。

description.en: MUI (Material-UI) component library usage guide and documentation. Automatically triggers when using MUI components: (1) creating/modifying Material-UI UI components, (2) solving MUI implementation issues, (3) querying MUI component properties and APIs, (4) implementing MUI layouts and theming, (5) migrating between MUI versions or customizing component behavior.
description.zh: MUI (Material-UI) 组件库使用指南和参考文档。在需要使用 MUI 组件开发 UI 时自动触发：(1) 创建或修改使用 Material-UI 的 UI 组件，(2) 解决 MUI 组件实现问题，(3) 查询 MUI 组件属性和 API，(4) 实现 MUI 布局和主题定制，(5) 在 MUI 版本间迁移或自定义组件行为。
